Docs.summary: Defines a set of SetTier suboperations to be executed as a single batched request.

Docs.param: A object indicating whether to only delete the blob, to delete the blob and all snapshots, or to only delete the snapshots.
An object that represents the condition that must be met in order for the request to proceed. If null, no condition is used.

Docs.summary: Adds an operation to be submitted as part of the batch.
